title: Bowl with Snakes
marks:
Signature, Inscription and Sticker

see Signed on bottom, incised: [Connie Mississippi / 2112]
description: bowl form with heavy, stepped base; textured interior with concave indentations; outer edges of bowl carved with snakes and balls in high relief, decorated with various incised and burned designs overall
creditline: Gift of the collection of Mari and Irving Lipton
